page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT & TRADE
page.content:
TRADES IN FALKLAND
Post Office,Palace Shop,Anne Heather's,Weaving,The Hayloft, Rake-a-round,Fruit Basket,Helen's, Kind Kyttocks Kitchen,Betty's Boutique,Reekies,Falkland Crafts, Beveridge's,Falkland Antiques,Simply Gifted,Stables Bookshop,Cottage Craft Centre.
The{POST OFFICE}has been in business, in its present situation, since 1977. The{PALACE}has been open to the public since 1952.The{SHOP}is open,in accordance with the{PALACE}from April- October. {ANNE HEATHER'S}is a grocers shop which has been in business, under present ownership, for 18 months.It is open all year. More on next page
